examples.korean: He has always emphatically denied the allegations. 발음듣기 그는 그 혐의를 항상 강하게 부정해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has always emphatically denied the allegations. 발음

examples.korean: The flavour of the garlic overpowered the meat. 발음듣기 마늘 냄새가 고기에 너무 강하게 배어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The flavour of the garlic overpowered the meat. 발음

examples.korean: The difficulties in her way merely strengthened her resolve. 발음듣기 그녀가 도중에 만나게 되는 난관들은 그녀의 결심을 더 강하게 할 뿐이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The difficulties in her way merely strengthened her resolve. 발음

examples.korean: The room smelt strongly of polish. 발음듣기 그 방에서는 광택제 냄새가 강하게 났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The room smelt strongly of polish. 발음

examples.korean: She pummelled her opponents. 발음듣기 그녀는 자신의 반대자들을 강하게 비판했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
